refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: A seealsoie identifies a See also cross-reference in an indexentry. The indexentrys occur in an index, not in the flow of the text. They are part of a formatted index, not markers for indexing.

refsection.title: Processing expectations
refsection.para: The indexentrys that include a seealsoie should be formatted normally, with the See also indented below the term.
A seealsoie is usually expected to generate the text See Also.
The linkends attribute should point other indexentrys in the same index. Online systems may use them to form hypertext links.
